info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 19 at 3:05AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI LANAI KAHOOLAWE AND THE BIG ISLAND REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Oahu, Maui, Molokai, Lanai, Kahoolawe, and The Big Island. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Conditions will be favorable for the development of heavy showers and thunderstorms today.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
